channel.title: Wearing certain item
channel.description:
How'd would I go upon making a Code, OR void, to make a certain item make you say something when being atked, Also an Emote?
I was thinking Along the lines of
[code]if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == itemcode[/code] what I have soo far, Any idea's?
